quote: When you can't make them see the light, make them feel the heat. – Ronald Reagan
fact: The Eisenhower interstate system requires that one mile in every five must be straight in case of war or emergency, they could be used as airstrips.
joke: I had a pair of racing snails. I removed their shells to make them more aerodynamic, but they became sluggish.
